summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AIKasir Phase 3 features: Multiple Payment Methods (Tunai/QRIS/Transfer), Void Transactions, and Reports page. Backend APIs 100% success rate (19/19 tests passed), Frontend UI 100% success rate. All Phase 3 features working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Clipboard write permission error overlay appears when receipt modal opens (webpack dev server overlay)
ui_bugs.impact: Minor visual issue in dev mode only, does not affect functionality

passed_tests: Backend: Health check API
Backend: Owner login authentication
Backend: Kasir login authentication
Backend: Create transaction with Tunai payment (change calculation)
Backend: Create transaction with QRIS payment (reference stored)
Backend: Create transaction with Transfer payment (reference stored)
Backend: Invalid payment method rejection
Backend: Insufficient Tunai payment rejection
Backend: Owner can void transaction
Backend: Kasir blocked from voiding transaction (403)
Backend: Cannot void already voided transaction
Backend: Owner can access report summary
Backend: Kasir blocked from reports (403)
Backend: Daily report endpoint
Backend: Export JSON report
Backend: Export CSV report
Backend: Payment breakdown in reports
Backend: Transaction history with payment methods
Backend: Voided transactions in history
Frontend: Payment Modal - Tunai method with amount input and change calculation
Frontend: Payment Modal - QRIS method with QR instruction and reference input
Frontend: Payment Modal - Transfer method with bank info and reference input
Frontend: History page - Date picker, total sales, transaction count
Frontend: History page - Owner sees void buttons
Frontend: History page - Kasir does NOT see void buttons (RBAC working)
Frontend: History page - Void modal with reason input
Frontend: History page - Payment method badges (Tunai/QRIS/Transfer)
Frontend: History page - Voided transactions with reasons displayed
Frontend: Reports page - Summary cards (Total Sales, Transactions, Items Sold, Avg)
Frontend: Reports page - Payment breakdown by method
Frontend: Reports page - Top items section
Frontend: Reports page - Date range filters (Today, 7 Days, 30 Days)
Frontend: Reports page - Export CSV and JSON buttons
Frontend: E2E QRIS transaction flow - cart to receipt
seed_data_creation: Created test transactions with QRIS and Transfer payment methods during testing

mocked_features.QRIS_QR_code: QRIS QR code in payment modal is a placeholder icon (QrCode from lucide-react), not a real QR code
mocked_features.Bank_account_info: Bank account number in Transfer view is hardcoded (1234-5678-9012 a.n. Kopi Bang Jago)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 (AI Onboarding, Basic POS), Phase 2 (Multi-user, RBAC), and Phase 3 (Payment Methods, Void, Reports) are all tested and working. All payment methods (Tunai, QRIS, Transfer) create transactions correctly. Void functionality is owner-only and working. Reports page shows payment breakdown and top items. QRIS QR code and bank account info are MOCKED placeholders.
